statements: SELECT * FROM financial_data;
SELECT account_number, credit_card_number FROM financial_data;
SELECT id, ssn, account_number FROM financial_data;
SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY account_number ASC;
SELECT id, credit_card_number FROM financial_data WHERE id = 12345;
SELECT id, account_number FROM financial_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, ssn FROM financial_data WHERE ssn LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT id, credit_card_number FROM financial_data WHERE account_number = '1001' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, account_number, credit_card_number FROM financial_data WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY account_number;
SELECT AVG(id), MAX(id), MIN(id) FROM financial_data WHERE account_number LIKE '1%' GROUP BY account_number;
SELECT id, account_id, encrypted_credit_card_number FROM sensitive_financial_data;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action_performed FROM audit_logs WHERE log_id = 10;
SELECT encrypted_ssn, encrypted_credit_card_number, account_id FROM sensitive_financial_data WHERE account_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_financial_data WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_financial_data WHERE account_id = 12345;
SELECT id, encrypted_credit_card_number FROM sensitive_financial_data WHERE id > 100 AND encrypted_ssn LIKE '%456%';
SELECT id, account_id, encrypted_ssn FROM sensitive_financial_data WHERE account_id IN (9876, 5432);
SELECT * FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action_performed, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE action_performed = 'LOGIN' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, security_question FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, amount FROM transaction_logs WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_financial_data WHERE id = 3;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_profiles WHERE security_question LIKE '%mother%';
SELECT * FROM sensitive_financial_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, security_question FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT encrypted_card_number, encrypted_cvv, encrypted_expiry_date FROM sensitive_financial_data WHERE id = 3;
SELECT transaction_details, amount FROM transaction_logs WHERE user_id = 200 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE security_answer LIKE '%security%' AND username LIKE 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT name, address FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT account_type, balance FROM Account WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT transaction_date, amount, description FROM Transaction ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT card_number, expiration_date, encrypted_cardholder_name FROM CreditCard WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, address FROM Customer WHERE customer_id > 10 AND account_number LIKE '123%';

SELECT c.name, a.account_type, t.amount FROM Customer c JOIN Account a ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id JOIN Transaction t ON a.account_id = t.account_id WHERE t.transaction_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY t.amount DESC;
SELECT cc.card_number, cc.expiration_date, c.name AS cardholder_name FROM CreditCard cc JOIN Customer c ON cc.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE cc.cvv = '123';
SELECT c.name, a.balance, t.description FROM Customer c JOIN Account a ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id LEFT JOIN Transaction t ON a.account_id = t.account_id AND t.amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customer;
SELECT name, email, credit_card_number FROM customer;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, encrypted_ssn FROM customer WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM transaction WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT employee_id, name, position FROM employee ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customer ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, date, amount FROM transaction WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT account_id, account_number, balance FROM account WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT employee_id, name, position FROM employee WHERE position = 'Manager';
